column4: and how do i make a symbolic link to it if there is stuff in it
well how do i upgrade it?
should i just delete the folder?
cause the package gave me an error
what should i do about this
What are you upgrading from, and to?
What steps exactly did you take to perform the upgrade?
Well, I'd say there's an upgrade bug in the x11-common package.
You followed the part of the guide that said you should have backups, right?
The part of the guide right at the top that says: "Do not upgrade to Edgy on your primary workstation - At least, please backup important data!"
